participant_1.background:

i also like ice cream.
i am single and go on dates regularly.
I run my own cleaning company and love spending time with my family.
i have 4 dogs.

participant_2.background:
I love having my dog around because he always makes me laugh.
I'm a solitary type and my favorite animal is the cat.
i have one older sister named mary.
I will miss my parents a lot since they moved to Florida.
I once got to see one of my favorite bands in concert.

content.text: Hey! What's your name?
My name is Jenny. What's yours?
My name is James. I'm a dog lover myself. What type of dog do you have?
I have a Golden Retriever named Buddy. He's the best dog ever.
I love Golden Retrievers. They're so friendly and loving.
They are! I'm a solitary type but I love spending time with my dog.
I hear ya. I'm a single guy and I go on dates regularly but I love spending time with my family and my dogs.
I have one older sister named Mary. She's my best friend.
That's awesome. I have a brother named John and a sister named Sarah.
Do you get along with your siblings?
Yeah, for the most part. We have our differences but we always have each other's backs.
That's great. My sister and I are always there for each other.
What do you like to do for fun?
I like to go to concerts. I recently got to see one of my favorite bands in concert.
That's awesome! I love going to concerts too. Who did you see?
I saw Imagine Dragons. They were amazing!
I've heard good things about them. I'll have to check them out.
You should! They're a great band.
Sounds good. Thanks for the recommendation.
No problem!
